1.2.0.en: Alarms can be inverted. Adjustable polling interval.

1.1.2.en: Fixed issue where ECO setpoint was not updated for IQC Touch

1.1.1.en: Fixed issue with trigger of Fan mode changed for IQC Touch

1.1.0.en: Added support for direct TCP/IP connection for IQC Touch units

1.0.1.en: Fixed issue where negative numbers did not display correctly
